1370: Segher was born in Paternoster straetje in 1370.
Got married to Ermegardis at age 26 in 1370.
Had a son with Ermegardis, Jacobus, at age 26.
1390: Lost his wife Ermegardis while she was giving birth to Folcard in 1390.
1373: Had a son with Ermegardis, Gherbaren, at age 29.
1377: Had a son with Ermegardis, Dammas, at age 33.
1378: Had a son with Ermegardis, Heinhocа, at age 34.
Lost son Heinhocа when Heinhocа was 1 years old.
1382: Lost son Gherbaren when Gherbaren was 10 years old.
1384: Had a daughter with Ermegardis, Rycaldis, at age 40.
1385: Had a son with Ermegardis, Arnulphus, at age 41.
1386: Had a son with Ermegardis, Geraldus, at age 42.
